悪法: (あくほう) - bad law; evil ways/evil way of doing things

悪症: (あくしょう) - malignant or virulent disease

悪計: (あくけい) - plot; trick; evil scheme
悪評: (あくひょう) - bad reputation; infamy; ill repute; unfavorable criticism; unfavourable criticism

悪運が強い: (あくうんがつよい) - having the luck to escape trouble (your behaviour has landed you in)

悪酔い: (わるよい) - drunken frenzy; drunken sickness

悪銭身に付かず: (あくせんみにつかず) - Easy come, easy go; Lightly comes, lightly goes; Soon gotten soon spent
